faq.title: Common issues when playing Dota 2 6.84
faq.description: Problems with launching, configuring, and connecting to game servers

content.part1: We are playing on version 6.84c. This is the latest game version on
content.part2: , as well as the most popular patch by player count.

content.part1: The client was downloaded directly from official Steam depots, so it is fully authentic. The servers run on Valve's official tool — srcds.exe, as expected. Therefore bans are not possible.
content.part2: For site authentication, a secure Steam service using the OpenID protocol is used — it does not transmit login, password, or other personal data. This method has long been used on many third-party resources.

ban.title: Can I play with a ban in Dota?

content.part1: Bans from the current Dota version do not apply to this client — they are not transferred here. But if you regularly leave games, spoil matches for others, or behave in a clearly toxic manner, you may receive a ban here. We monitor order and do not turn a blind eye.

console.title: How to open the console?
console.content: Bind it in the control settings and run the game via a batch file (the -console parameter is specified there)

connection.title: I can't connect to the game server

content.checkAccounts: Make sure the accounts on the site and Steam match.
content.ukraineNote: If you are from Ukraine or the previous methods did not help, try using tools to bypass ISP blocks.
content.internetNote: If you're already using it, try disabling it.
content.redownload: Redownload and re-pack the client using 7-zip.

newDota.title: I get the new Dota opening, not the old one

content.part1: Before connecting to the server, open the old client first. Enter the data from the table about the accepted game (format: connect ip) into the console and press Enter.

clientLimit.title: Only one Dota 2 client per customer

content.part1: Close the new or old Dota client if it's already running (kill the process via Task Manager). Only one Dota client can be running at the same time.
You need to add 'cd ' at the start of the .bat file using Notepad.
content.path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Dota 6.84 (replace with the path to the old Dota client)

launchError.title: The game isn't launching, what should I do?

content.part1: Most likely you're missing something. Possible solutions:

possibleSolutions.part1: You haven't extracted the game archive and are trying to run the game from the archive. Extract the archive using 7-zip and run the game.
possibleSolutions.part2: Try clearing Steam's download cache or switching the account before launching the old client.
possibleSolutions.part7: If nothing helps – reinstall the operating system.

steamClient.title: Steam client is missing or out of date

content.part1: One of the options below will help fix this issue:
content.solution4: Turn off Invisible mode in Steam
content.solution5: Run DOTA Classic and Steam as administrator

launcherError.title: dota launcher DLL failed to load / Setup file 'gameinfo.txt' doesn't exist in subdirectory 'dota2'

content.part1: The game archive may not have extracted completely. We strongly recommend using 7-zip to extract.
content.part2: To fix it you need to avoid Russian/Cyrillic letters in the path or unpack the archive to the desktop. If that doesn't help, unpack the game archive to the root of drive C: or D:

keybindAbility.title: Is there a way to enable stopping abilities with a separate key (for example, rearm on Tinker)?
keybindAbility.content: No, there is no such feature.

mouseBind.title: Is there a way to bind any function to the mouse wheel or remap camera movement?
mouseBind.content: No, there is no such option.

smartAttack.title: Can I enable "smart attack"?
smartAttack.content: No, there is no such feature.
